verses.text: \w When|strong="G5613"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w how|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*,

(\w Though|strong="G2544"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,)
He \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* must \w needs|strong="G1163"\w* \w go|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* cometh \w he|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Sychar|strong="G4965"\w*, \w near|strong="G4139"\w* to the parcel of \w ground|strong="G5564"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G5207"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jacob’s|strong="G2384"\w* \w well|strong="G4077"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, being \w wearied|strong="G2872"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \add his\add* \w journey|strong="G3597"\w*, \w sat|strong="G2516"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w well|strong="G4077"\w*: \add and\add* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* \w the|strong="G5610"\w* \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

There \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w* to \w draw|strong="G0501"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w to drink|strong="G4095"\+w*.\wj*

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* were gone \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w buy|strong="G0059"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*.)

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="G4542"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, How is it \w that|strong="G4459"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w askest|strong="G0154"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, which \w am|strong="G5607"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="G4542"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w have|strong="G4798"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w dealings|strong="G4798"\w* with the \w Samaritans|strong="G4541"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w thou knewest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the gift|strong="G1431"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w who|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w that saith|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w to drink|strong="G4095"\+w*; \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w wouldest have asked|strong="G0154"\+w* \+w of him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he would have given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w living|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w water|strong="G5204"\+w*.\wj*

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, thou \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3777"\w* to draw \w with|strong="G0502"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w well|strong="G5421"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w deep|strong="G0901"\w*: from \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* hast \w thou|strong="G2192"\w* \w that|strong="G5204"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*?

\w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* greater \w than|strong="G3187"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w well|strong="G5421"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drank|strong="G4095"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w children|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w cattle|strong="G2353"\w*?

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w drinketh|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the water|strong="G5204"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w shall give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* shall \+w never|strong="G0165"\+w* \+w thirst|strong="G1372"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w the water|strong="G5204"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I shall give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w a well|strong="G4077"\+w* \+w of water|strong="G5204"\+w* \+w springing up|strong="G0242"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w everlasting|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I \w thirst|strong="G1372"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w hither|strong="G1759"\w* to \w draw|strong="G0501"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w call|strong="G5455"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w husband|strong="G0435"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w hither|strong="G1759"\+w*.\wj*

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou hast|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w I have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w husband|strong="G0435"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w thou hast had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w five|strong="G4002"\+w* \+w husbands|strong="G0435"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w hast|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w husband|strong="G0435"\+w*: \+w in that|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w saidst thou|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w truly|strong="G0227"\+w*.\wj*

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, I \w perceive|strong="G2334"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w the hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w ye shall|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w mountain|strong="G3735"\+w*, \+w nor yet|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\+w*, \+w worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w ye know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3739"\+w*: \+w we|strong="G2249"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w we worship|strong="G4352"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w salvation|strong="G4991"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the Jews|strong="G2453"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w the hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4353"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0228"\+w* \+w worshippers|strong="G4353"\+w* \+w shall worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in truth|strong="G0225"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w seeketh|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w to worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w a Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they that worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in truth|strong="G0225"\+w*.\wj*

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Messias|strong="G3323"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*, which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, he will \w tell|strong="G0312"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w that speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he.\+add*\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*: \w yet|strong="G3305"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* seekest \w thou|strong="G2212"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* talkest \w thou|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*?

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w waterpot|strong="G5201"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went her \w way|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w men|strong="G0444"\w*,

\w Come|strong="G1205"\w*, \w see|strong="G1492"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* that \w ever|strong="G3745"\w* I \w did|strong="G4160"\w*: \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3385"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* the \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w In|strong="G1722"\w* the mean \w while|strong="G3342"\w* his \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w prayed|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w Hath|strong="G5342"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add ought\add* to \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w meat|strong="G1033"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the will|strong="G2307"\+w* \+w of him that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to finish|strong="G5048"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w*, \+w There are|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w four months|strong="G5072"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add then\+add* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w harvest|strong="G2326"\+w*? \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Lift up|strong="G1869"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w eyes|strong="G3788"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w look on|strong="G2300"\+w* \+w the fields|strong="G5561"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w white|strong="G3022"\+w* \+w already|strong="G2235"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w harvest|strong="G2326"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that reapeth|strong="G2325"\+w* \+w receiveth|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w wages|strong="G3408"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gathereth|strong="G4863"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w* \+w eternal|strong="G0166"\+w*: \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that soweth|strong="G4687"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that reapeth|strong="G2325"\+w* \+w may rejoice|strong="G5463"\+w* \+w together|strong="G3674"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w herein|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w that|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0228"\+w*, \+w One|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w soweth|strong="G4687"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w reapeth|strong="G2325"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w to reap|strong="G2325"\+w* \+w that whereon|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w bestowed|strong="G2872"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w labour|strong="G2872"\+w*: \+w other men|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w laboured|strong="G2872"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are entered|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w labours|strong="G2873"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Samaritans|strong="G4541"\w* of \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, which \w testified|strong="G3140"\w*, He \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w ever|strong="G3745"\w* I \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.
